summary: Here is a very rough version of the Meeseeks mod, based on the popular character from the Adult Swim cartoon, Rick and Morty.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: This is a demo version of the Meeseeks Box mod. In this mod, you can use a Meeseeks Box to summon a Meeseeks and issue it a few simple fetch commands. It's a bit buggy, though, and I recommend saving your game before trying it.

Installation: Dump the contents of the zip file into your "data" folder. (should be C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\Data). Make sure you've also installed the separate mod, race compatibility. Start the Skyrim launcher and click "data files." Make sure only RaceCompatibility.esm and MeeseeksRace.esp are checked. And make sure RaceCompatibility.esm is above MeeseeksRace.esp in the list. If it isn't, highlight RaceCompatibility.esm and click the up arrow by "modify load order" until it is at the top of the list. Next launch the game.

Find the Meeseeks Box in the Riverwood Trader. Or if you like, bring up the console command, with the ~tilde~ key and type "coc riverwoodriverwoodtrader". There's a chest on the second floor, "Rick and Morty Chest," which contains the Meeseeks Box. I've noticed that he sometimes gets stuck, especially when told to bring you armor or weapons. I've had the highest success rate with "gold."

This mod is best demonstrated in a little room I made. Type "coc xxx" in the command console. Retrieve the box from the chest behind the bar.
author: Cougan from reddit aka superkarateninja
